comment:
{
    "VARIABLES": "Let x be the number of brownies made and y be the number of lemon squares made, both integers.",
    "CONSTRAINTS": [
        "5x + 7y \leq 2500",
        "4x + 6y \leq 3300",
        "y \geq x",
        "x \geq 0",
        "y \geq 0",
        "x \geq 0.4(x+y)"
    ],
    "OBJECTIVE": "Minimize 4x + 6y"
}
